$interpreted: Tica: Ooooooo, naughty~ You shouldn't point your weapon at anyone. What if someone gets hurt?
Pang: ...What is the meaning of this? I do not believe I have committed any crime.
Naya: I heard you two talking about monsters.
Naya: As a Royal Security Officer, and for the safety of the Prairie, I demand that you identify yourselves.
Pang: ...Before you stands a mere traveler, from the East Alliance.
Tica: My turn???
Tica: Hehehe~
Tica: All of Vendacti has heard of the renowned Headmaster of the Rune Academy, Charle Ceres.  Well, now is your chance to get to know him...
Tica: When I can take you there. I'm just his student, Tica Chevalier!!!
Naya: ...Totally suspicious.
Naya: Why would a student of the Academy be travelling with a Beast?
Tica: Oh, ya~ I'm helping Professor Clovis find his lost Experiment. I almost had him, but Mr. Pang was starting to attack him.
Naya: What the bicklebutt are you talking about? A lost experiment? Why is the experiment a boy?
Pang: That was clearly a monster, poor child!
Tica: Not. A. Monster. He's inorganic matter brought to life with special Runes.
Tica: Hehe~ I'd love to take him apart and see how it works.
Naya: I'll decide whether or not it's a monster.
Naya: So where'd that thing go?
Tica: ——Uhhhh...he's gone!!!!
Tica: Experiment~~~~Where~Are~You~???
Naya: Hey, are you sure that monster headed this way?
Tica: I told you. He's not a monster...
Tica: Hmmm...Professor Clovis did say he loves stone tablets.
Naya: Who is this "Professor Clovis" character?
Tica: Oh. He used to teach at the Academy. He's got some stuff for the Headmaster and I'm the one responsible for bringing it back.
Tica: But I messed up big time, bucko. Experiment is gone.
Tica: If I don't bring him back, Professor Clovis said I won't be able to go into his lab.
Naya: What'd you do?
Tica: Just stuff I always do. Nothing big, ya know. Like——
Naya: Hey!! That's dangerous. And what are you doing?
Pang: ...Your humble servant would like to ask: Why must I follow along?
Naya: I already told you. You're not going anywhere until I find out what's going on with these monsters and whether or not you two are innocent.
Naya: With the authority instilled in me by the Kingdom, I command that you come with me. Or else...
Pang: Your humble servant is still looking for his lost companion. I've no time for this, ma'am.
Pang: If you're afraid I'll run off, just have someone follow me.
Naya: Can't do it. All my officers were sent to the nearby village to search for monsters.
Naya: There's no one left to watch you.
Pang: ...Is that so?
Pang: There wouldn't be another reason for this, would there?
Naya: Another reason!? If you've got something to say just say it!
Pang: May I suggest that perhaps it is due to my beastly appearance that you find me suspicious? After all, this is not unheard of, ma'am.
Naya: YOU!!
Naya: Don't you accuse me of such nonsense. If you so much as——
Tica: Eh? So were together, huh? Which means we're a...TEAM!
Tica: Ok, cool. So I'll be Team Captain~
Tica: Team Tica, let's go!
Tica: Comrade Naya? Comrade Pang? Aren't we going to look for Experiment?
Naya: Listen up, little girl. Just look at this——
Pang: The ground's shaking! Are earthquakes common in the Kingdom?
Naya: What's an earthquake?
Pang: It's...
Tica: Waaaaahhhhh!!! Wait!! We don't want to block your path!
Pang: Careful!
Tica: Wah! Comrade Pang's got quick reflexes! We nearly got trampled by those wolves!
Naya: ...Thank you.
Naya: I take my job seriously. I know some humans don't like your kind. I'm not like that.
Pang: ...Don't worry about it.
Naya: That's weird. They looked scared.
Pang: That shaking...there's no way a stampede of wolves caused——
Tica: There's more!
Naya: Even more violent than the last! They——
Pang: Focus! They're headed right this way!
Naya: As if they're being chased...
Naya: Could they have run into your little "friend"?
Pang: That's very likely.
Tica: No way, Jose. Experiment is super-duper gentle!
Naya: Whatever it is, we've got to check it out!

Model.Text: Ooooooo, naughty~ You shouldn't point your weapon at anyone. What if someone gets hurt?
...What is the meaning of this? I do not believe I have committed any crime.
I heard you two talking about monsters.
As a Royal Security Officer, and for the safety of the Prairie, I demand that you identify yourselves.
...Before you stands a mere traveler, from the East Alliance.
My turn???
Hehehe~
All of Vendacti has heard of the renowned Headmaster of the Rune Academy, Charle Ceres.  Well, now is your chance to get to know him...
When I can take you there. I'm just his student, Tica Chevalier!!!
...Totally suspicious.
Why would a student of the Academy be travelling with a Beast?
Oh, ya~ I'm helping Professor Clovis find his lost Experiment. I almost had him, but Mr. Pang was starting to attack him.
What the bicklebutt are you talking about? A lost experiment? Why is the experiment a boy?
That was clearly a monster, poor child!
Not. A. Monster. He's inorganic matter brought to life with special Runes.
Hehe~ I'd love to take him apart and see how it works.
I'll decide whether or not it's a monster.
So where'd that thing go?
——Uhhhh...he's gone!!!!
Experiment~~~~Where~Are~You~???
Hey, are you sure that monster headed this way?
I told you. He's not a monster...
Hmmm...Professor Clovis did say he loves stone tablets.
Who is this "Professor Clovis" character?
Oh. He used to teach at the Academy. He's got some stuff for the Headmaster and I'm the one responsible for bringing it back.
But I messed up big time, bucko. Experiment is gone.
If I don't bring him back, Professor Clovis said I won't be able to go into his lab.
What'd you do?
Just stuff I always do. Nothing big, ya know. Like——
Hey!! That's dangerous. And what are you doing?
...Your humble servant would like to ask: Why must I follow along?
I already told you. You're not going anywhere until I find out what's going on with these monsters and whether or not you two are innocent.
With the authority instilled in me by the Kingdom, I command that you come with me. Or else...
Your humble servant is still looking for his lost companion. I've no time for this, ma'am.
If you're afraid I'll run off, just have someone follow me.
Can't do it. All my officers were sent to the nearby village to search for monsters.
There's no one left to watch you.
...Is that so?
There wouldn't be another reason for this, would there?
Another reason!? If you've got something to say just say it!
May I suggest that perhaps it is due to my beastly appearance that you find me suspicious? After all, this is not unheard of, ma'am.
YOU!!
Don't you accuse me of such nonsense. If you so much as——
Eh? So were together, huh? Which means we're a...TEAM!
Ok, cool. So I'll be Team Captain~
Team Tica, let's go!
Comrade Naya? Comrade Pang? Aren't we going to look for Experiment?
Listen up, little girl. Just look at this——
The ground's shaking! Are earthquakes common in the Kingdom?
What's an earthquake?
It's...
Waaaaahhhhh!!! Wait!! We don't want to block your path!
Careful!
Wah! Comrade Pang's got quick reflexes! We nearly got trampled by those wolves!
...Thank you.
I take my job seriously. I know some humans don't like your kind. I'm not like that.
...Don't worry about it.
That's weird. They looked scared.
That shaking...there's no way a stampede of wolves caused——
There's more!
Even more violent than the last! They——
Focus! They're headed right this way!
As if they're being chased...
Could they have run into your little "friend"?
That's very likely.
No way, Jose. Experiment is super-duper gentle!
Whatever it is, we've got to check it out!
